1: <pb/><t>Loq'imaj ta naq i QaJaaw Dios. Re' taq i hat raj kamanoom,</t> <t>chayeew taq ruloq'il i rub'ihnaal.</t>
2: <pb/><t>Eh nee ta naq inye'arik ruloq'il i rub'ihnaal i QaJaaw Dios,</t> <t>je' yu'naak, je' chi juneliik.</t>
3: <t>Chu'nchel ta naq i tinamit neen ye'wik ruloq'il i QaJaaw,</t> <t>chi je' wilkeeb' parelb'aal q'iij, chi je' wilkeeb' parookb'aal q'iij.</t>
4: <t>Re' QaJaaw Dios wilik rajaawriik chinaah chu'nchel i tinamit.</t> <t>Eh xiik' naah i ruloq'il ar pan taxaaj.</t>
5: <pb/><t>Re' QaJaaw Dios wilik cho chi taaq'anik pan taxaaj,</t> <t>ma' awach ta chik jino'q chi je' rukab' i reh.</t>
6: <t>Re' reh i ruloch' riib' chi rilariik i wach ak'al,</t> <t>je' wo' chi rilariik i pan taxaaj.</t>
7: <t>Re' QaJaaw Dios i ruyeew runimaal kiwach i neb'aa',</t> <t>eh irutoob'eej taqe i ma' xta wilik keh.</t>
8: <t>Reh chi rukoj taqe haa' chi kixilak i wilik kajaawriik,</t> <t>je' wo' chi kixilak i rutinamiit wilik kajaawriik.</t>
9: <t>Eh re' ixoq ma' re' ta aj k'isoom i ruyeew rusuqkiil ruk'ux,</t> <t>ruum i ruyeew taqe rak'uun rixq'uun. <pb/>Loq'imaj ta naq i QaJaaw Dios.</t>
